newsitem.title: POLAND: Dealers see zloty at 2.43 pct from parity next wk.
newsitem.headline: Dealers see zloty at 2.43 pct from parity next wk.

text.p: The Polish zloty is seen trading an expected resistance level near 2.43 percent from the central parity rate, according to a Reuters poll of Polish forex dealers on Friday.
The zloty closed on Friday at 2.31/2.25 percent from the central parity rate after repeated central bank interventions this week sent it tumbling from about four percent last Monday.
Forecasts of traders from 14 large Polish banks ranged from 2.0 to 2.75 percent. The poll's result was calculated as a mean average of 10 predictions, excluding the two highest and lowest forecasts.
